item.title: Political Dynasty Tarnished as Former Judge Celebrezze Pleads Guilty to Tampering
item.description: A former judge admits to guilt in a criminal case sparked by reporting by The Marshall Project - Cleveland. Sentencing will be at a later date.

item.title: ‘We Know Where You Live.’ Protesters Say ICE Agents Retaliate With Threats, Investigations
item.description: ICE observers and critics report being audited, pulled over, called by name or followed home by agents.

item.title: Judge Denies Trump Bid to End Protected Status for Haitians as ICE Fears Loom
item.description: Roughly 350,000 Haitians are in the U.S. through legal status granted because of natural disasters and armed conflict in their home country.

item.title: Deadly Errors: Why People Keep Dying Inside Cuyahoga County’s Jail
item.description: Jail administrators fail to fix mistakes that continue to cost lives, an analysis of state records by The Marshall Project - Cleveland shows.

item.title: There’s a Process for Investigating Killings by Federal Officers. Minneapolis Is a ‘Complete Aberration’
item.description: The Trump administration’s efforts to exclude the state from investigations into the killings of Renee Good and Alex Pretti go against decades of prac...
